scripts.docs:update: node scripts/update-tech-book-metadata.js && node scripts/update-api-docs.js && node scripts/update-components.js && node scripts/update-performance-docs.js
scripts.docs:all: npm run analyze:project && npm run docs:update && npm run status:update
scripts.docs:full: npm run docs:scan && npm run docs:analyze-batches && npm run docs:update-batches
